metadata.description: Technology breakthrough probabilities and impacts for energy transition modeling
metadata.methodology: Probabilistic breakthroughs applied as expected value (probability x impact) by scenario
sources: NREL Annual Technology Baseline 2024 - Advanced technology pathways
MIT Energy Initiative - Future of Energy Storage 2022
DOE Hydrogen Shot and Earthshots Initiative
Academic literature on perovskite, solid-state batteries, SMRs
BNEF New Energy Outlook 2024 - Technology assumptions
metadata.notes: Conservative applies only proven tech; Baseline applies >50% probability breakthroughs; Optimistic applies >30% probability with full impact

Conservative.notes: Only apply breakthroughs with >90% probability, and at 50% of potential impact

Baseline.notes: Apply breakthroughs with >50% probability at 75% of potential impact

Optimistic.notes: Apply breakthroughs with >30% probability at full potential impact

perovskite_tandem.description: Perovskite-silicon tandem cells reaching 30%+ efficiency in commercial production

impact.notes: Panel efficiency from 22% to 30-32%, further cost decline through simpler manufacturing

perovskite_tandem.current_status: Lab records of 33%+, pilot production lines active (Oxford PV, Hanwha Q Cells)

bifacial_ubiquitous.description: Bifacial modules become standard, increasing energy yield 10-20%

agrivoltaics_scaling.description: Dual-use solar (agriculture + PV) expands land availability

impact.notes: Reduces land-use conflicts, increases total addressable area

solid_state.description: Solid-state batteries reach mass production with 2x energy density

impact.notes: 500+ Wh/kg vs 250-300 Wh/kg current, faster charging

solid_state.current_status: Toyota targeting 2027-2028, QuantumScape, Solid Power pilots

sodium_ion_grid_scale.description: Sodium-ion batteries dominate grid storage at 50% lower cost

impact.notes: No lithium or cobalt, abundant sodium, lower cost ceiling

sodium_ion_grid_scale.current_status: CATL, BYD already shipping Na-ion cells at $60-70/kWh pack level

floating_offshore.description: Floating offshore wind becomes cost-competitive, unlocking deep water sites

impact.notes: Opens 80% of offshore wind resource (deep water)

floating_offshore.current_status: Hywind Scotland, Kincardine operational; Principle Power, BW Ideol designs maturing

super_large_turbines.current_status: Vestas V236-15.0, Siemens Gamesa 14-222 deployed; 20 MW in development

cold_climate.description: Cold-climate heat pumps maintain COP 2.5+ at -25C

impact.notes: CO2 refrigerant, cascade systems, variable speed compressors

cold_climate.current_status: Mitsubishi Hyper-Heating, Fujitsu XLTH already achieve this in premium models

cop_improvement.description: Average air-source COP improves from 3.5 to 5.0+

impact.notes: Reduces grid stress from heating electrification

green_hydrogen_2_dollar.description: Green hydrogen production cost falls below $2/kg

impact.notes: Makes hydrogen competitive with natural gas for industrial heat

electrolyzer_efficiency.description: Electrolyzer efficiency improves from 65% to 80% (HHV basis)

smr_deployment.description: Small Modular Reactors achieve factory production and competitive costs

impact.notes: Factory production enables learning curve, reduces risk premium

smr_deployment.current_status: NuScale certified, X-energy, Kairos in development; Russia floating SMR operational

advanced_reactors_gen_iv.description: Gen IV reactors (molten salt, high-temp gas) reach commercial deployment

impact.notes: Higher temperatures enable process heat applications

advanced_reactors_gen_iv.current_status: China HTR-PM operational; TerraPower Natrium, X-energy in development

v2g_ubiquitous.description: Vehicle-to-grid becomes standard, EVs provide grid services

impact.notes: 200 million EVs with 60 kWh average = 12,000 GWh mobile storage

v2g_ubiquitous.current_status: Nissan Leaf V2G, Ford F-150 Lightning bidirectional; ISO standards maturing

charging_infrastructure.current_status: Tesla Supercharger V4, IONITY 350 kW deployed

hvdc_supergrid.description: Continental-scale HVDC supergrids enable renewable smoothing

impact.notes: Connects wind in different weather systems, solar across time zones

hvdc_supergrid.current_status: China UHV grid, North Sea offshore grid projects

impact.notes: Removes technical barrier to 100% renewable grids

dac_below_200.description: Direct Air Capture costs fall below $200/tonne CO2

impact.notes: Currently $400-600/tonne; learning curves similar to solar needed

dac_below_200.current_status: Climeworks, Carbon Engineering operational; 1PointFive under construction

combined_scenario_impacts.description: Net effect of all applicable breakthroughs by scenario

Conservative.notes: Conservative assumes no breakthroughs beyond proven learning curves
